data: The name of Herr Balthasar was well known throughout the whole hill-country: not a child but had heard of his vast riches, and had some story to tell of him.

The Old Man of the Mountain, The Lovecharm and Pietro of Abano
Tales from the German of Tieck
browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: mythology, legends & folklore|category: german literature
